title: Extraction Is The Future of Cannabis Industry With Lincoln Johnson, EnCann Solutions
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Lincoln Johnson is founder and CEO of EnCann Solutions, a high volume cannabis and hemp oil extraction company. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss why cannabis is a once in a lifetime market opportunity, the unique extraction method EnCann brings to the industry, and why he thinks CBD will soon dwarf the THC market. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
